name: .PWA File Extension
summary: Learn about .PWA files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A PWA file is a secure database created by Moon Software Password Agent, a password management program. It stores sensitive information such as login credentials, secret notes, and other private data. PWA files are encrypted, making their contents accessible only with the correct master password.

content: Individuals and organizations that manage many online accounts or confidential records are most likely to use PWA files. By consolidating information into a single encrypted file, users can maintain a high level of security while keeping their data organized.

instructions: You can open PWA files through Password Agent, which prompts for the master password before displaying any stored data. Once unlocked, the software enables you to view, add to, or update your saved entries. Without the correct password, the database remains encrypted, preventing unauthorized access to its contents.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
